CustomField.formula:
/*[Inter]*/ IF(AND(NOT(CONTAINS($Label.RT_Consigne_Compte, RecordType.Id)),OR(CONTAINS($Label.RT_INT_Compte, RecordType.Id ),CONTAINS($Label.RT_INT_Compte2, RecordType.Id))), IF($Label.Consulter_Ticket_INTER == $Label.TECH_ENV_NOT_AVAILABLE, HYPERLINK($Label.TECH_ENV_NOT_AVAILABLE,$Label.Click_Here), HYPERLINK($Label.Consulter_Ticket_INTER+Reference__c+"&uiculture=en-EN", $Label.Click_Here)),
/*[France only]*/ IF(OR(CONTAINS($Label.RT_France_Compte, RecordType.Id), CONTAINS($Label.RT_Consigne_Compte, RecordType.Id)), IF($Label.Consulter_Ticket == $Label.TECH_ENV_NOT_AVAILABLE, HYPERLINK($Label.TECH_ENV_NOT_AVAILABLE,$Label.Click_Here), HYPERLINK($Label.Consulter_Ticket+Reference__c+"&uiculture=fr-FR", $Label.Click_Here )),null) )
CustomField.label: Consulter les tickets
